actiontrackingcamera_option_camera_rotat: Can rotate the camera to keep up with the action
actiontrackingcamera_option_user_interru: Pause camera tracking when the user moves the mouse etc
actiontrackingcamera_option_show_comment: Show a commentary panel with information about the action
actiontrackingcamera_option_tracking_ret: Draw a reticle around the units being tracked
playernametags_option_onlycomms_desc: Name tags will only be shown on Commanders
replaycontrolbuttons_option_visibleprogr: Show progress bar for the replay
